StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateTelephone]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @TelephoneType char(1), @AreaCode varchar(4), @TelephoneNumber varchar(10), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND TELEPHONE_TYPE = @TelephoneType) BEGIN --- UPDATE TELEPHONE DATA UPDATE CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE SET AREA_CODE = @AreaCode, TELEPHONE_NUMBER = @TelephoneNumber, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND TELEPHONE_TYPE = @TelephoneType END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT TELEPHONE DATA INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, TELEPHONE_TYPE, AREA_CODE, TELEPHONE_NUMBER, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@PersonID, @TelephoneType, @AreaCode, @TelephoneNumber, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
